summary: Drifting is a spell to summon a sword
descriptionHtml:
Install : Extract the zip files to \\data folder, and check the Swordspear.esp at the launcher Menu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sword Spear spell at the start of the game automatically will be obtained.

Drifting is a spell to summon a sword

is powertap. Shout button to cast

Certain range of the actor to a random target

player and his colleagues will be excluded from the target.
But the sword to attack an enemy player to take damage when hit.
Please look for details, video

one Sword : 70 damage(Stamina 5% to the player take damage.)

Script processing speed due to
Casting has not run ...

The downside target is not right sword
Is not a hostile
author: Kgorilla
